comment: refer to FAPI interface
RNTI in range 1 - 65535
MCS-table for PUSCH, choose among '256QAM','64QAMLowSE' for transform precoding disabled
choose among '256QAM','MCStable61411', 'MCStable61412' for transform precoding disabled
MCS index
nTransPrecode 0: transform precoding disabled, 1: transform precoding enabled
0: non-codebook-based transmission, 1: codebook-based transmission
layer number from 1 to 4
Value: 1, 2, 4
antenna port index list, support from 1000 to 1003

DMRS.comment: UL DMRS symbol number, 1: single symbol,  2: double symbol
DM-RS CDM groups without data,Refer to Table 6.2.2-1 in spec 38.214. Value: from 1 to 3
UL additional DMRS position DL-DMRS-add-pos Value: from 0 to 3

comment: VRB to PRB mapping, 'non-interleaved' or 'interleaved'
Resource block bundle size L, refer to section  6.3.1.6 in spec 38.211
Precoding matrix indicator Value: from 0 to 27
Start symbol index of PUSCH mapping, include both DMRS and data
PUSCH duration in symbols include both DMRS and data
Resource allocation type (currently only support type 1). 0: type0, 1:type1

ResAlloType1.comment: For resource allocation type 1.The starting resource block for this ULSCH allocation
The number of resource blocks allocated to this     DLSCH grant.

comment: Redundancy version from 0 to 3
HARQ Process number. from 0 to 15
New data indication, 0: retransmission, 1: new data
Refer to section 6.3.1.2 in spec 38.211 It equals the higher-layer parameter Data-scrambling-
Identity if configured, and the RNTI equals the C-RNTI, otherwise L2 needs to set it to physical cell id.
Scaling configured by higher layer parameter, 0.5, 0.65, 0.8,1
0: no ULSCH, 1: with ULSCH
EnableACK          - Flag to enable or disable the HARQ-ACK
NumACKBits         - Number of HARQ-ACK bits (0...1706) (default 10)
BetaOffsetACK      - Beta offset for HARQ-ACK (default 20)
ACKbits      - Source of HARQ-ACK contents
EnableCSI1         - Flag to enable or disable the CSI part 1
NumCSI1Bits        - Number of CSI part 1 bits (0...1706) (default 10)
BetaOffsetCSI1     - Beta offset for CSI part 1 (default 6.25)
CSI1bits     - Source of CSI part 1 contents
EnableCSI2         - Flag to enable or disable the CSI part 2
NumCSI2Bits        - Number of CSI part 2 bits (0...1706) (default 10)
BetaOffsetCSI2     - Beta offset for CSI part 2 (default 6.25)
CSI2bits     - Source of CSI part 2 contents
ACK Beta offset Index Value from 0 to 15
TP with Pi2BPSK. 0: TpPi2BPSK Disabled 1: TpPi2BPSK Enabled
PUSCH  period in slot
slot offset list in the period
